Package es.gencom.mpegg.format

Class GenInfo<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.gencom.mpegg.format.GenInfo<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessUnitContainer, AccessUnitHeader, AccessUnitInformation, AccessUnitProtection, DatasetContainer, DatasetGroupContainer, DatasetGroupHeader, DatasetGroupMetadata, DatasetGroupProtection, DatasetHeader, DatasetMetadata, DatasetParameterSet, DatasetProtection, DescriptorStreamContainer, DescriptorStreamHeader, DescriptorStreamMetadata, DescriptorStreamProtection, Label, LabelList, MasterIndexTable, MPEGFileHeader, Reference, ReferenceMetadata
    public abstract class GenInfo<T>
extends Object

    An abstract class that holds MPEG-G container KEY (see 6.3) and which all MPEG-G containers must extend.

    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky & Daniel Naro

        public abstract void write​(es.gencom.mpegg.io.MPEGWriter writer)
                    throws IOException,
                           InvalidMPEGStructureException
        The method to write the structure content into the bitstream.
        Parameters:
        writer - bitstream writer to write the structure.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidMPEGStructureException

      • writeWithHeader

        public final void writeWithHeader​(es.gencom.mpegg.io.MPEGWriter writer)
                           throws IOException,
                                  InvalidMPEGStructureException
        Generic method to write structure with its header into the bitstream. If size() method is overwritten it writes directly into the bitstream. Otherwise, the structure is written to a buffer first (to calculate the size).
        Parameters:
        writer -
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidMPEGStructureException

      • sizeWithHeader

        public long sizeWithHeader()

      • size

        protected long size()
        The data content size. If size is unknown (zero), write() method writes the content to a buffer first.
        Returns:
        the size of the data content.

      • write

        public final void write​(WritableByteChannel channel)
                 throws IOException,
                        InvalidMPEGStructureException
        Generic method to write structure into the channel. If size() method is overwritten it writes directly into the channel. Otherwise, the structure is written to the buffer first (to calculate the size).
        Parameters:
        channel -
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidMPEGStructureException

      • write

        public final void write​(SeekableByteChannel channel)
                 throws IOException,
                        InvalidMPEGStructureException
        Generic method to write structure into the seekable channel. There is no need to know the size as the header is written after the content.
        Parameters:
        channel -
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidMPEGStructureException
